name: Peggy
description:
Peggy is a big egg, so big no one is able to provide enough heat for her to hatch. So, she decided to do the most natural thing: go to the Earth's core to find the primal nest, the only one capable of helping her.

Controls:

Space - Jump/wall jump

R - Restart

P - Pause

Made for the Low Effort Jam 10 - "Egg"

Palette: PICO-8

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure
